thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 46 of 227
thread.title: Todd Schneider
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Todd Schneider

author: Todd Schneider
title: Todd Schneider
text: From the consultation in the store to the delivery, everyone at Gardner White in Brighton went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my purchase. The delivery guys did a great job of getting the couch into my basement (no easy feat) and set it up just like the showroom!
